headline: Ministry of Labor Requests Documentation
flavor: A routine inspection has been scheduled. Your federation registry looks... optimistic.

choices.label: Expedite the process
choices.outcome: The inspector finds your documentation exemplary. He leaves with a new watch.

choices.label: Request an extension
choices.outcome: The inspection is postponed. Your file moves higher in the priority stack.

choices.label: Provide full transparency
choices.outcome: Auditors are satisfied but curious. They'll be back.

headline: A Generous Benefactor Appears
flavor: A local notable has taken interest in your 'worker empowerment' initiatives. Their motives are unclear but their checkbook is not.

choices.label: Accept their generous support
choices.outcome: The money flows. Worker representatives ask uncomfortable questions you're now too busy to answer.

choices.label: Politely decline
choices.outcome: Your integrity is noted. Your budget remains constrained.

headline: Wildcat Strike in the Textile Sector
flavor: Workers at a major factory have walked out. They claim their 'union' doesn't represent them. Technical difficulties.

choices.label: Coordinate with management
choices.outcome: The strike is broken. Production resumes. Some workers are no longer employed.

choices.label: Send federation mediators
choices.outcome: Grievances are logged and categorized. A committee will be formed.

choices.label: This is not your jurisdiction
choices.outcome: The strike continues. Momentum builds.

headline: Currency Devaluation Impacts Operations
flavor: The currency has lost 30% of its value overnight. Your operating costs have not adjusted accordingly.

choices.label: Implement efficiency measures
choices.outcome: Belts are tightened. Services are 'streamlined.' Workers notice.

choices.label: Request emergency patronage
choices.outcome: Benefactors step in. Their conditions are not written down.

headline: Journalists Investigate 'Paper Unions'
flavor: A reporter is asking questions about federation membership numbers. Your math is creative.

choices.label: No comment at this time
choices.outcome: The story runs anyway. You are quoted as 'unavailable for comment.'

choices.label: Provide alternative metrics
choices.outcome: Your PR consultant earns their fee. The headline focuses on 'stakeholder diversity.'

choices.label: Open the books
choices.outcome: Your honesty is refreshing. Auditors are intrigued by what they find.

headline: Election Commission Announces Timeline
flavor: The labor election is approaching. Your delegate count is being scrutinized.

choices.label: Accelerate federation building
choices.outcome: New federations appear on the registry. Their offices remain undiscovered.

choices.label: Focus on existing federations
choices.outcome: Quality over quantity. Auditors find less to question.

headline: Special Investigation Launched
flavor: The Ministry has received 'credible reports' about irregularities. An independent auditor has been appointed.

choices.label: Files are unfortunately unavailable
choices.outcome: The investigation is delayed. The auditor's report will be comprehensive when it arrives.

choices.label: Full cooperation protocol
choices.outcome: Evidence is shared. Some federations are quietly dissolved. Others survive.

headline: Rival Federation Challenges Your Legitimacy
flavor: A competing labor bloc claims your federations don't represent actual workers. They have documents.

choices.label: Question their funding sources
choices.outcome: The discourse becomes mutual. Journalists are confused about who to trust.

choices.label: Propose a strategic alliance
choices.outcome: Former rivals become partners. Workers are not consulted.

choices.label: Our documentation speaks for itself
choices.outcome: The challenge is noted in the official record.
